name: Lunalight Wolf
effectText: If a "Lunalight" monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
pendEffect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Lunalight" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. Once per turn: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Lunalight" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your field or Graveyard.
